editors.name: stage
sprite
editors.value:
@onstart()
def my_onstart(self): # functions need different names
    self.my_distance = 2 # create a sprite variable

    for i in range(360): # repeat code 360 times
        self.forward(self.my_distance)
        self.turn_right(1)

@onstart()
def do_counting(self):
    self.my_counter = 0
    self.watch('my_counter')
    
    global counter, other
    while True:
        time.sleep(0.1)
        counter += 1
        self.my_counter += random.randrange(4)
        letter = chr(random.randrange(65, 65 + 26))
        if letter not in other:
            other[letter] = [0, 0]
        other[letter][random.randrange(2)] += 3
